H0.text: From which areas of space can there be no escape. Neutron Star

H1.text: From which areas of space can there be no escape. Dark Matter Region

H2.text: From which areas of space can there be no escape. Event Horizon of a White Dwarf

H3.text: From which areas of space can there be no escape. Blackhole

A4.text: A black hole is an astronomical body so compact that its gravity prevents anything, including light, from escaping.

A5.text: The event horizon is a boundary in spacetime through which matter and light can pass only inward towards the center of the black hole. Nothing, not even light, can escape from inside the event horizon.
